tool_description: Over 90% accurate on our tests.  Pass it text, get back a score representing the sentiment of the text you pass in. Trained on IMDB movie data.
name: Text Tone Sentiment
title: Text Tone Sentiment

api_list.name: getSentiment
api_list.description: Pass it text, get back a float score representing the sentiment of the text you pass in.   Scores equal to 0 and higher are positive, higher the score the more positive the statement.  Scores less than 0 are negative, lower the more negative.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mikerlynn-text-tone-v1.p.rapidapi.com/api/sentiment/v1"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mikerlynn-text-tone-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://mikerlynn-text-tone-v1.p.rapidapi.com/api/sentiment/v1"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mikerlynn-text-tone-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
